fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Perform the Factional Kill
-Prepare a Counterattack for the night (Costs 5 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-While preparing a Counterattack, you gain Invincible Defense and will attack anyone who attacks you with a Powerful Attack.
-If you are fatally attacked during the night, you will instead die at the end of the next night and trigger Counterattack for free that night.
-The cause of death will be obfuscated if you die from a nightkill.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were killed by a Japanese Samurai.” (Factional or Counterattack kill)
“They were killed in Japan’s last stand!” (Kill while fatally wounded)
“They finally died from a mortal wound.” (On death by delayed nightkill)
